title: Irrigation Systems | Crop Production & Management| Middle School Science | Khan Academy

tasks.task: Understand and explain the concept of irrigation in agriculture.
subtasks: Identify the essential ingredient for plant survival.
Explain the process of irrigation and its importance in agriculture.
Discuss factors determining the right amount and timing of water irrigation.
Identify different sources of irrigation water (groundwater, surface water, non-conventional sources).
Describe traditional irrigation methods (pulley system, rotating chain pump, lever system, furrow irrigation).
Describe modern irrigation techniques (sprinkler system, drip irrigation) and their benefits.

tasks.task: Summarize the sources, methods, and advancements in irrigation.
subtasks: Mention water sources for irrigation (groundwater, surface water, non-conventional).
Explain traditional irrigation methods used in agriculture.
Highlight modern irrigation techniques and benefits.
Compare traditional and modern irrigation methods in terms of efficiency and sustainability.
